none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on November 16, 2010 Description from Terminal Escape:
This might look a little familiar, and you might think you've seen this KRÜEL tape on Terminal Escape before, and you might be right...kinda. This is a pretty strange second demo - KRÜEL re-recorded almost all of their Terror Tape demo with Jon HELPLESS and then released it with the same cover art (but printed on a red paper instead of white). This recording captures their fury way better, and songs like "Anti-Systema" are total classics in the world of blown out raw DBeat. But don't take my word for it, those of you in the SF area should just come see them tonight at The Knockout. TERROR TAPE (v.2)
//4.bp.blogspot.com/_UWPI3C1CSoU/TOIu3pVvODI/AAAAAAAABY4/zwAewQ4oV00/s1600/Kruel+cover.jpg http://terminalescape.blogspot.com/2010/03/kruel.html http://terminalescape.blogspot.com/2010/09/helpless.html //www.blogger.com/goog_1989829267 //1.bp.blogspot.com/_UWPI3C1CSoU/TOIxDaH6deI/AAAAAAAABY8/hWwoDC7rQoY/s1600/double+feature+nov++16th.jpg

seo.title: KRUEL - Terror Tape demo #2 - Terminal Escape
